doc.title: What Happened to Tom in the Ladies Gym? (????)
doc.plot: A bevy of pretty coeds enter a locker room and strip down to their (suspiciously fancy) underwear, only to find that their gym clothes have been stolen. Never at a loss, they decide to go ahead and exercise in their underwear. When Tom, the prankster who stole their gym clothes, shows up, the girls extract revenge in him.
